name: Pinball (itch) (civic71)
description:
PINBALL


Pinball is a 2d free flipper, with 5 levels and online leaderboards. Available in English ( default ) , Italian, French, German, Spanish and Russian. Start by entering your nickname and a flag to represent you. Unlock 5 levels by accumulating as many points as possible.

Levels:

1° CASINO: do collide your ball towards the slot machines or roulette spinning;

2° DJMUSIC: schreach, making the ball colliding with turntables;

3° SPORT: make goal and break down the various pins ....;

4° SPACE : whack planets, galaxies and the Sun but be careful of the BlackHole;

5° DRACULA: break the case and hit Dracula and his bats!

Main commands are: C (or M) , Z, Space , P , mouse or arrows keys to menu.

C or M to move right;

Z : to move left (option: If pressing Z + M the left will divert the ball on the left).

Space : the principle is used to launch the ball, while at a later time you will need to shake the Pinball and then divert the trajectory of the ball (if you exceed 10 shake will go haywire!).

P : is used to pause the game (this is also possible by clearing the game window).

In the menu use the mouse or arrows keys to move among the buttons (from version 2.0);

Every time you will create a new record that will be sent automatically to the online leaderboard.

This game was ranked 1° competition of gmitalia.altervista.org :D

Download Directly from my site

Info page with ranking online
